ability: 【C】 You can have any number of cards with the same name as this card in your Deck.

name: “突然変異”セルヴァム
flavor_text: マーティン「記録にある地球原産生物のいずれにも該当しないな……」
ability: 【C】 You can have any number of cards with the same name as this card in your Deck.
【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is 1 or lower, you may REVERSE that Character.

name: “野生動物”セルヴァム
flavor_text: アダム「こいつら予定外だぞ！」
ability: 【C】 You can have any number of cards with the same name as this card in your Deck.
【C】 For each Marker under this card, this card gets ＋2000 Power.
【自】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose up to 3 「“野生動物”セルヴァム」 or 「“突然変異”セルヴァム」 or 「“翼竜型生物”セルヴァム」 from your Waiting Room, place them under this card face-up in any order as Marker.

name: “破壊の王”ゴジラ
flavor_text: 滅びるのは、人か、ゴジラか
ability: 【A】 During the turn when this card is placed on Stage from Hand, at the beginning of your Attack Phase, you may place all Characters of all players other than this card into Waiting Room. If you did, until end of opponent's next turn, this card gets ＋2000 Power, gains the following Ability.『【A】 This ability can only be activated up to 1 time each turn. When the Damage dealt by this card is cancelled, you may deal Ｘ Damage to your opponent. Ｘ is equal to the number of Soul of this card.』（Damage can be cancelled）
【A】［③ Place 2 cards from Hand into Waiting Room］ When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you did, deal 5 Damage to your opponent.（Damage can be cancelled）

name: 轟く咆哮
flavor_text: ハルオ「散開しろ！」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Gate：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: “対ゴジラ戦術”ハルオ

ability: 【C】 All your other《アラトラム号》 Characters gets ＋500 Power.

name: “希望を託して ”メトフィエス
flavor_text: あれがゴジラであり、なおかつ単独であるならば、対処の方針はただひとつ。殲滅あるのみです

【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: “惑星の沿革”ガルグ
flavor_text: だが俺たちはメカゴジラ開発に失敗し、お前たちの教義も地球人を洗脳しきれなかった。それが歴史だ。『もしも』は夢物語でしかない
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose 1 of your 《アラトラム号》 Character, during this turn, it gets ＋1500 Power.

name: “不安な眼差し”ユウコ・タニ
ability: 【C】 If your Stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets ＋1500 Power.

name: “影の協力者”メトフィエス

name: “収監者の告解”ハルオ

name: ゴジラ完全殲滅の可能性と新戦術について

ability: Search your Deck for up to 1 《アラトラム号》 Character and up to 1 《怪獣》 Character and show them to opponent, add them to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards. Choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room. Place this card into Clock.

ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.

すごい……こんなにも速く、自由に！
